Package state

Class BookingState

Object
state.BookingState
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBookingState
public class BookingState
extends Object
implements IBookingState
BookingState is a concrete implementation of IBookingState.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BookingState()
    Create a new BookingState that keeps track of the next booking number it will generate (starting from 1 and incrementing by 1 each time a new booking number is needed), and an empty list of bookings
    BookingState​(IBookingState other)
    Copy constructor to make a deep copy of another BookingState instance

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Booking createBooking​(Consumer booker, EventPerformance performance, int numTickets, double amountPaid)
    Create a new Booking (includes generating a new unique booking number) and add it to the booking state
    Booking findBookingByNumber​(long bookingNumber)
    Get a Booking with the specified booking number
    List<Booking> findBookingsByEventNumber​(long eventNumber)
    Get a list of all the Bookings for a TicketedEvent with the given event number

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • BookingState

      public BookingState()
      Create a new BookingState that keeps track of the next booking number it will generate (starting from 1 and incrementing by 1 each time a new booking number is needed), and an empty list of bookings

  • Method Details

    • findBookingByNumber

      public Booking findBookingByNumber​(long bookingNumber)
      Description copied from interface: IBookingState
      Get a Booking with the specified booking number
      Specified by:
      findBookingByNumber in interface IBookingState
      Parameters:
      bookingNumber - unique booking identifier to look up in the booking state
      Returns:
      Booking corresponding to the bookingNumber if there is one, and null otherwise

    • findBookingsByEventNumber

      public List<Booking> findBookingsByEventNumber​(long eventNumber)
      Description copied from interface: IBookingState
      Get a list of all the Bookings for a TicketedEvent with the given event number
      Specified by:
      findBookingsByEventNumber in interface IBookingState
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier to find bookings for
      Returns:
      List of Bookings for the TicketedEvent corresponding to the provided event number

    • createBooking

      public Booking createBooking​(Consumer booker, EventPerformance performance, int numTickets, double amountPaid)
      Description copied from interface: IBookingState
      Create a new Booking (includes generating a new unique booking number) and add it to the booking state
      Specified by:
      createBooking in interface IBookingState
      Parameters:
      booker - Consumer who made the booking
      performance - EventPerformance that the booking is for
      numTickets - number of tickets booked
      amountPaid - amount paid for the booking in GBP
      Returns:
      The newly created Booking instance
